Trigger.Name: The Phantom Train readies Doom Strike.
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Phantom Train readies Doom Strike.

Trigger.Name: The Phantom Train uses Diabolic Whistle.
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Phantom Train uses Diabolic Whistle.

Trigger.Name: Program Set
Trigger.RegularExpression: The Guardian gains the effect of (?<current>.*) Simulation

Trigger.Name: You suffer the effect of Abandonment
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Abandonment

Trigger.Name: You suffer the effect of Aether Rot
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Rot

Trigger.Name: You suffer the effect of Searing Wind
Trigger.RegularExpression: You suffer the effect of Searing Wind

Trigger.Name: Wings of Destruction: Proximity
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:2900:Kefka starts using Wings Of Destruction on Kefka

Trigger.Name: Wings of Destruction: Halfcut
Trigger.RegularExpression: 14:2901:Kefka starts using Wings Of Destruction on Kefka

Trigger.Name: Graven Image starts using Ave Maria
Trigger.RegularExpression: Graven Image starts using Ave Maria

Trigger.Name: Graven Image starts using Indolent Will on Graven Image
Trigger.RegularExpression: Graven Image starts using Indolent Will on Graven Image

Trigger.Name: Graven Image starts using Pulse Wave on Player
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 14:28DD:Graven Image starts using Pulse Wave on (?<name>[a-zA-Z'\- ]+)

Trigger.Name: Graven Image starts using Indulgent Will on Player
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 14:28E5:Graven Image starts using Indulgent Will on (?<name>[a-zA-Z'\- ]+)

Trigger.Name: Graven Image starts using Idyllic Will on Player
Trigger.RegularExpression: ^\[\d\d:\d\d:\d\d.\d\d\d\] 14:28E6:Graven Image starts using Idyllic Will on (?<name>[a-zA-Z'\- ]+)
